sentence.Network_en: He has clear blue eyes and a dazzling smile.
sentence.Network_cn: 他有一双清澈的蓝眼睛和一脸灿烂的微笑。

sentence.Network_en: Every tree, wall and fence stood out against dazzling white fields.
sentence.Network_cn: 每棵树、每堵墙和每道栅栏都在白得耀眼的田野映衬下十分夺目。

sentence.Network_en: He gave Alberg a dazzling smile.
sentence.Network_cn: 他冲着阿尔伯格粲然一笑。

encyclopedia.content: 乐队简介 乐队名称：dazzling乐队 组建年份：2007年10月 学校：东北师范大学附属中学（高中部） 乐队配置：主唱-节奏吉他；主音吉他；贝司；架子鼓；键盘。 风格：Rock（摇滚） 乐队简历： 由前贝司手张延，前键盘手丁羽于2007年10月组建，现任吉他兼主唱王宣博，键盘及音响工程师杨天旸，前主音吉他田济斋加入。2008年，丁羽退队，2009年，张延退队，2010年，田济斋退队，同年，现任主音吉他葛金桥，鼓手卢弘宇，贝司手曲阳加入

entry.tran: 辉煌的;灿烂的;艳丽的;动人的
entry.def: Something that is dazzling is very impressive or beautiful.

example.ex: He gave Alberg a dazzling smile.
example.tran: 他冲着阿尔伯格粲然一笑。

entry.def: A dazzling light is very bright and makes you unable to see properly for a short time.

example.ex: He shielded his eyes against the dazzling declining sun.
example.tran: 他用手遮挡眼前落日耀眼的余晖。

means.word_mean: 1. amazingly impressive; suggestive of the flashing of lightning;

sentences.sentence: "these great best canvases still look as astonishing and as invitingly new as they did...when...his fulgurant popularity was in full growth"- Janet Flanner
"adventures related...in a style both vivid and fulgurous"- Idwal Jones

auth_sentence.content: Her gawky, bony clumsiness had suddenly transformed itself into dazzling beauty.
auth_sentence.res_content: Her gawky, bony clumsiness had suddenly transformed itself into dazzling beauty.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Her gawky, bony clumsiness had suddenly transformed itself into dazzling beauty.

auth_sentence.content: The sun is a glowing speck in a dazzling multitude of stars.
auth_sentence.res_content: The sun is a glowing speck in a dazzling multitude of stars.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The sun is a glowing speck in a dazzling multitude of stars.

auth_sentence.content: They can also spark dazzling shows of the northern lights, or aurora borealis.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: They can also spark dazzling shows of the northern lights, or aurora borealis.

means.word_mean: 晃眼睛的; 光彩夺目的

sentences.en: The evening was crowned by her dazzling performance.
sentences.cn: 她那令人炫目的表演把晚会的气氛推向高潮。

sentences.en: The light reflecting off the snow was dazzling.
